## Tender Announcement

### Title
Replacement of 160 Batteries for Galaxy VM 160 KVA at Transport Canada

### Reference Number
WS4572925560-Doc4574309260

### Solicitation Number
WS4572925560

### Tender Closing Date and Time
14:00 EST on 2024-07-10

### Procurement Information
* This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
* Bids will be evaluated based on Lowest Price.
* The procurement method is Competitive - Open Bidding.
* The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

### Goods or Services
* The requirement is for the replacement of 160 batteries for Galaxy VM 160 KVA.
* The end-user entity is the Department of Transport (TC).

### Contracting Entity and End-User Entity
* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) - Contracting Entity
	+ Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada
* Department of Transport (TC) - End-User Entity
	+ Address: 330 Sparks Street, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0N8, Canada

### Contact Information
* Jeffrey Pakeman (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: jeffrey.pakeman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Notice URL
* https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19621786?extsite=MTk2MjE3ODZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

This tender announcement is a Request for Proposal (RFP) under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) for the replacement of 160 batteries for Galaxy VM 160 KVA at Transport Canada. The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), and the end-user entity is the Department of Transport (TC).

Bids will be evaluated based on Lowest Price, and the procurement method is Competitive - Open Bidding. The tender closing date and time is 14:00 EST on 2024-07-10.
